channel.title: How do i make my server more popular
channel.description: I just need some suggestions guys i mean i want people who have ran a server for awhile to answer and dont put stupid crap down like...make it 24/7 or something...but i have like perfect pking...training and skilling....i had some help with my server..So i aint a awesome coder but i dont kno my way around coding..its not exactly hard to read java XD.. So anybody care to help would be great XD

and also join some private server forums liek this one and advertise there
